concept.title: Support
concept.shortdesc: The Support Information page lets you designate custom contact information to display in the reporting interface or specify a custom Help section.

conbody.p: Displays default support information for Supported Users. A Supported User is authorized to work directly with Adobe support resources such as Customer Care. You can also designate support information for unsupported users (users not authorized to work with Adobe support resources).

row.entry: Lets you override contact information for unsupported users.

entry.p: Lets you display custom help desk information in the Help drop-down. The custom content might display additional support contacts, problem escalation procedures, and so on.
Help Title: The title for the custom help section.

Help Text: The text to include in the custom help section. Analytics supports the following HTML tags in the custom help field:
, , , , ,
    ,
      ,
